title: tEnai sErkkum
sahitya:
tEnai sErkkum tEnipOlat-tyAgam sheivOmE


anupallavi

  vAna mEgham pOla ulagil vaLam pozhivOmE


caraNam 1    pADupaTTut-tEDit-tEDip-pangu vaittuNbOm
nADu sezhikka vIDu sezhikka nanmai tazhaikkavE
    caraNam 2    viNNulagai maNNulagil viLangak-kANuvOm
paNNum paNiyaip-paraman pUjaiyAgap-paNNuvOm
    caraNam 3    pala madattin saLLiyinri bhakti jnAnattAl inda ulaga vAzhvai 
ilangum karma yOgamAkkuvOm shuddha bhOgamAkkuvOm
